title: Texas GOP map cleared for 2026 elections
shortDescription: Supreme Court allows Texas to use a congressional map with Republican advantage for 2026 midterms despite racial bias claims.

title: Trump says he’s 'so happy' second term delayed
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke on the 2020 election and honored two members of the National Guard as he lit the National Christmas Tree.

title: President Trump lights National Christmas Tree
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump participated in the National Christmas Tree lighting ceremony on the National Mall.

title: Grand jury declines to reindict Trump target Letitia James
shortDescription: A federal grand jury declined to indict New York Attorney General Letitia James less than two weeks after a judge threw out an earlier indictment against her.

title: Supreme Court lets Texas use voting map favored by Trump
shortDescription: Texas officials had asked the Supreme Court to revive the map, which was designed to help Trump's party keep control of Congress in midterm elections.

title: Trump jokes to African leaders about 'killing each other'
shortDescription: Trump hosted the leaders of Democratic Republic of the Congo and Rwanda in an attempt to cement a peace deal to end their decades-long conflict.

title: Trump taps new architect for White House ballroom amid clash over size
shortDescription: The White House has hired a new lead architect for Donald Trump's White House ballroom after the president clashed with the original architect.

title: Congressional watchdog will investigate Trump official’s conduct
shortDescription: Bill Pulte has been an outspoken critic of people the White House deemed enemies and accused officials targeted by Trump of mortgage fraud.

title: Trump and Mamdani talked again after White House meeting
shortDescription: While the New York mayor-elect said the two discussed addressing cost of living, what remained out of the talk may affect the budding relationship.

title: White House set to submit plans for Trump's controversial ballroom
shortDescription: The White House plans to submit design plans for President Trump's controversial ballroom to the National Capital Planning Commission in December.

title: Step back in time with historic photos of White House holiday decor
shortDescription: Celebrate festive White House holiday designs from past first ladies, from Melania Trump to Jacqueline Kennedy and Michelle Obama.

title: Can 'Trump Accounts' boost savings for lower-income Americans?
shortDescription: The program is expected to begin on July 4, 2026 for children born between 2025 and 2028 with a valid Social Security number.

title: 'Congratulations, world!' USIP now named after Trump. What else may be?
shortDescription: The State Department named the Peace Institute after Donald Trump. Bills have also suggested naming Dulles airport, DC train and $100 bills after him.

title: Why peace talks over Russia’s war in Ukraine remain stalled | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Trump’s peace plan meets resistance as Ukraine, Russia and Europe weigh the latest proposal.

title: Virginia man accused of planting pipe bombs before Capitol riot Jan. 6
shortDescription: The pipe bombs were placed near the offices of the Democratic and Republican national committees on the night of Jan. 5, 2021.

title: Trump’s name added to Institute of Peace
shortDescription: The State Department announced the 41-year-old Institute of Peace was renamed after President Donald Trump.

title: Tennessee race prompts calls inside the GOP to 'sharpen' messaging
shortDescription: A Republican’s single-digit win in Tennessee already has GOP lawmakers talking about shifting their political strategy in next year's midterms.
